Name: Strawberry Daiquiri (frozen)
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of half strawberry (or lime wedge).
BLEND all ingredients with two-thirds filled 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Garnish with strawberry (or lime wedge) on rim.
History: Unknown but the earliest published recipe is said to be in home economist, Mabel Stegner's 1952 book Electric Blender Recipes .
